title:u/pandapaxxy's Deep Stone Crypt weapons breakdown, M+KB edition
description:Originally found at https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/k10o67/deep_stone_crypt_mnk/


// Heritage
//notes:pandapaxxy (M+KB / PvE): "For PvE I don’t think it will beat First In, Last Out if you wanted a quick answer. For a longer answer you’re going to want fluted barrel for a faster handling shotgun. Reconstruction is the new perk here. [...] Combine that with the new recombination that gives Heritage a damage bonus when you kill enemies with your energy weapon (up to 1.5x) means you get a pocket Izanagi’s Burden. [...] I could see recombination breaking the game a bit" Recommended MW - Reload.|tags:mkb,pve

// Heritage
//notes:pandapaxxy (M+KB / PvP): "For the Crucible there are much better slug shotguns. Without quickdraw you cannot compete with pellet shotguns and no opening shot means FILOs that were rolled for PvP outclass you." Recommended MW - Handling.|tags:mkb,pvp

// Heritage
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvP): "In PvP without Quickdraw you're really missing a ton. Gunnora's Axe and Blasphemer both got sunset but have better perk pools for PvP. Opening shot is really nice to have but not a must. Quickdraw is. You can certainly make a "Quickdraw" feel with high handling. You won't need to increase the range because Heritage is over the 65 range cap of slugs. A let down for a good slug replacement." Recommended MW - Handling.|tags:controller,pvp
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=1840239774,791862061,3161816588,957782887
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=4090651448,791862061,3161816588,957782887
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=1840239774,106909392,3161816588,957782887
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=4090651448,106909392,3161816588,957782887
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=1840239774,791862061,3161816588,588594999
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=4090651448,791862061,3161816588,588594999

// Succession
//notes:pandapaxxy (M+KB / PvE): "Succession looks to take over for Bite of the Fox or the Long Shadow. Unfortunately it cannot succeed them  [...] For PvE you really want the new reconstruction perk. If you have a mag extension, backup mag and reconstruction you can potentially have a 10 shot sniper with the highest damage per shot. Combine that with vorpal weapon and you could really tear into bosses from afar." Recommended MW - Reload.|tags:mkb,pve
dimwishlist:item=2990047042&perks=1840239774,106909392,1523832109,1546637391

// Succession
//notes:pandapaxxy (M+KB / PvP): "For PvP Succession will not beat any of your usual snipers. The very high 50 zoom puts it behind things like Bite of the Fox, Adored, and ties the new Cloudstrike exotic." Recommended MW - Handling.|tags:mkb,pvp
dimwishlist:item=2990047042&perks=1840239774,3142289711,2039302152,957782887
dimwishlist:item=2990047042&perks=1840239774,106909392,2039302152,957782887
dimwishlist:item=2990047042&perks=1840239774,3142289711,2450788523,957782887
dimwishlist:item=2990047042&perks=1840239774,106909392,2450788523,957782887

dimwishlist:item=2990047042&perks=1840239774,106909392,588594999,957782887

dimwishlist:item=2990047042&perks=1840239774,106909392,588594999,1546637391



// Posterity
//notes:pandapaxxy (M+KB / PvE): "180s have not really been meta since the howl twins and that was definitely an exception. For PvE I find their damage per shot to be really poor and the lower mag on Posterity compared to something like Malfeasance doesn’t do it justice. Rapid hit and rampage are certainly the go to and reconstruction while neat won’t really work on a weapon you’re going to want to use more often." Recommended MW - Reload.|tags:mkb,pve
dimwishlist:item=3281285075&perks=1840239774,106909392,247725512,3425386926
dimwishlist:item=3281285075&perks=1482024992,106909392,247725512,3425386926

// Commemoration
//notes:pandapaxxy (M+KB / PvE): "A Hammerhead replacement is now upon us. It is definitely worse in comparison (think adored to beloved) and not having access to quickdraw makes this really live up to the heavy machine gun name. Commemoration does have a few tricks up its sleeve, namely dragonfly. Dragonfly on a machine gun was previously exclusive to this season's Thermal Erosion, but now that it's on a 450 it just makes proccing dragonfly that much easier. If you don’t want the feeding frenzy rampage option then dragonfly is certainly a top tier choice." Recommended MW - Reload.|tags:mkb,pve

// Commemoration
//notes:pandapaxxy (M+KB / PvP): "For PvP you’re going to want to maximize range. Full bore does give the best bonus but also drops stability and handling, and on a gun with 44 handling you really don’t want to be losing more. Dynamic sway reduction since the buff is the best choice for increasing your accuracy. Since we don’t have quickdraw that means surplus can give us a very close feel. Granted you need to have all three of your abilities up to have the best buff it can still give you enough handling to be noticeable." Recommended MW - Range.|tags:mkb,pvp
